description.__cdata:
Men's beach shorts KMB-210 is a model that is sure to attract your attention. The striking transition from one color to another will make them stand out from other men's shorts. They have a loose and versatile leg length, a mid-rise top and two practical pockets on the sides. There is a drawstring tie at the waist and an elastic band, so the shorts adjust to any type of men's figure. They are made of polyester, the main advantages of which are that they dry quickly, do not lose color, do not warp or crease. In addition, the material is resistant to sunlight, an ideal model for both the beach and the pool. Another advantage is that when the shorts get wet, a water print appears on them.
Polyester 100 %
